name: The 'cross db ownership chaining' database flag for Cloud SQL on the SQL Server instance is set to 'off'
query: G{ cloudSqlInstances( where: { engine: "sqlserver" cloudProvider: "gcp" OR: [ { dbFlags_NONE: { name: "cross db ownership chaining" } } { dbFlags_SOME: { name: "cross db ownership chaining", value: "on" } } ] } ) { ...AssetFragment }}
